alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 15 at 10:11AM CST until February 20 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River At Edinburg affecting Leake County. Pearl River Above Philadelphia affecting Neshoba County. Pearl River Near Carthage affecting Leake County. For the Upper Pearl River...including Philadelphia, Edinburg, Carthage, Walnut Grove, Lena, Kosciusko, Ratliff`s Ferry, Ofahoma, Jackson...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River At Edinburg. * WHEN...Until Monday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 24.6 feet. - Forecast...The river has crested and will continue to fall through Thursday. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Pearl River Edinburg 20.0 24.6 Wed 8 am CST 24.0 23.2 21.8 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 9 PM CST.
